required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Designed to Evaluate the Safety of Prophylactic Depakote ER in the Treatment of Adolescents With Migraine
clinical_study.official_title: Divalproex Sodium Extended-Release Tablets for Migraine Prophylaxis in Adolescents: An Open-Label, Long-Term Safety Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine if long-term treatment, up to 1 year, with Depakote ER is safe in the reduction of occurrence of migraine headaches in adolescents.
